mapper.insert: insert into memo(mno, title, content, sender, receiver, write_time, is_read, disable_by_sender, disable_by_receiver) values(memo_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{sender}, #{receiver}, sysdate, 0, 0, 0)
mapper.select: select mno, title, content, sender, receiver, write_time writeTime, is_read isRead, disable_by_sender disableBySender, disable_by_receiver disableByReceiver from memo where mno=#{mno} and rownum=1

select * from (select m.*,rownum rnum from (select mno, title, sender, receiver, write_time writeTime, is_read isRead from memo where receiver=#{receiver} and disable_by_receiver=0) m where rownum<=#{endRowNum}) where rnum>=#{startRowNum}
mapper.update: update memo set is_read=1 where mno=#{mno} and rownum=1

#{item}

#{item}
mapper.delete: delete from memo where disable_by_sender=1 and disable_by_receiver=1
